posts.postText: Hai Guys... I'm returning to NNJG!:D I used to be known as Deathwing... (Name sucked bro) But anyways yeah. More than likely no one remembers me sooooo... I'm Minooti. I'm 16 and I make indie films and games.
I think I remember you. Anyways welcome to the forums. Rules readplease post. And you should share some of those indie games sometime. :D
Indie films hmm, you should message me sometime, I think you would find it beneficial, but anyways hello :)
Welcome! Enjoy your stay at the NNJG forums. On behalf of my geeks I'd like to personally say READRULESFORUMSPOSTTOASTEASTCOAST
